# Daily COVID-19 Cases for LA County
The United States is struggling to control the coronavirus pandemic, with several counties reporting record high numbers of cases. Meanwhile, Europe has essentially brought it's cases down and passed its peak.  In this simple plotting exercises, we look at the cases for LA county to see if there are any trends in the upwards or downwards direction.  Charts from more counties will be added as the data is updated, as well as charts for daily deaths.  The code has been hidden for better readability.
source.130fce59: So we see that unfortunately, daily cases have been trending upward on average, and they had never really dropped, despite national cases showing a dip in May and June.
